example.text: When will [[user]] leadership bring gun violence prevention bills to the floor? Over 100 Americans lose their lives daily to gun violence, and it is the leading cause of death for kids in ? ?. [[user]], put our children's lives over the interests of the gun lobby. [[url]]

Today, [[user]] met to discuss our efforts to reach across the aisle and find common ground with Republicans to pass gun violence prevention legislation. We have to get this done for our children and for future generations, and [[user]] is leading the way. [[url]]

Great news for American families: inflation has slowed for the 10th straight month. This will help ease the burden of higher prices and continues a good trend in the right direction, and there is more work to do to get prices down. [[url]]

Republicans have countered with an even more callous response: They respond to every death with deafening silence. The Gun Violence Prevention Task Force will continue our work to hold Republicans accountable for their obstruction.

Great news for American families: inflation has slowed for the 10th straight month. This will help ease the burden of higher prices and continues a good trend in the right direction, and there is more work to do to get prices down. [[url]]

Rep. Thompson has been leading efforts to address ongoing issues at the port to help agricultural producers access global markets. Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, which Rep. Thompson voted to pass, the port was awarded a $36 million grant to address port congestion and help improve the movement of goods.

Gun violence is an epidemic. If you need more evidence of that, look at last week. Shootings in Cleveland, Henryetta, Atlanta, Allen, & the everyday gun violence are ravaging our communities. This is not acceptable, & Congress must act. Watch my remarks calling for action NOW ? [[url]]
